block.p: Maria Venus Palmiery, the daughter of Crispina Palmiery and Dr. Ponciano Palmiery of Florham Park, N.J., was married yesterday to Dr. Ramil Soy Bhatnagar, the son of Soledad Bhatnagar and Dr. Rajesh Bhatnagar of New York. The Rev. Alex Enriquez performed the Roman Catholic ceremony at noon in the Cathedral Basilica of the Sacred Heart in Newark. Pandit Baljeet Shastri led a Hindu celebration later in the day at Birchwood Manor, a banquet hall in Whippany, N.J.

Mrs. Bhatnagar, 30, was until last month a nurse practitioner in the neonatal intensive care unit at Morristown (N.J.) Memorial Hospital. She graduated from Seton Hall University and received a master's degree in nursing from Northeastern University. Her father is an associate neonatologist at St. Barnabas Medical Center in Livingston, N.J. He also has a pediatric practice in Newark and Harrison, N.J., and the bride's mother manages his offices.

Maria Venus Palmiery, the daughter of Crispina Palmiery and Dr. Ponciano Palmiery of Florham Park, N.J., was married yesterday to Dr. Ramil Soy Bhatnagar, the son of Soledad Bhatnagar and Dr. Rajesh Bhatnagar of New York. The Rev. Alex Enriquez performed the Roman Catholic ceremony at noon in the Cathedral Basilica of the Sacred Heart in Newark. Pandit Baljeet Shastri led a Hindu celebration later in the day at Birchwood Manor, a banquet hall in Whippany, N.J.

Mrs. Bhatnagar, 30, was until last month a nurse practitioner in the neonatal intensive care unit at Morristown (N.J.) Memorial Hospital. She graduated from Seton Hall University and received a master's degree in nursing from Northeastern University. Her father is an associate neonatologist at St. Barnabas Medical Center in Livingston, N.J. He also has a pediatric practice in Newark and Harrison, N.J., and the bride's mother manages his offices.

Dr. Bhatnagar, 30, is a chief resident in orthopedic surgery at the Boston Medical Center. He received a bachelor's degree and an M.D. from Northwestern University. His father is a pediatrician in Congers, N.Y., and the bridegroom's mother is a nurse in his office.
